title: Add PDF story library with categories and admin upload functionality

requirements.text: Create a backend data model for PDF stories with fields: id, title, category (Islamic or Historical), language (Urdu), pdfUrl, description, uploadDate, and authorName

quotes: I enter Islahi pdf stories in urdu islamic, historical etc

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores PDF story metadata in a Map structure
Each story has a unique ID
Category field accepts 'Islamic' or 'Historical' values
Language field is set to 'Urdu'

requirements.text: Add backend methods to create, read, and list PDF stories with filtering by category
acceptanceCriteria: Implement addStory() method to add new PDF stories
Implement getStory(id) method to retrieve a single story
Implement getStoriesByCategory(category) method to filter stories
Implement getAllStories() method to retrieve all stories

requirements.text: Create an admin page at /admin/upload-story with a form to upload PDF stories including fields for title, category selection (Islamic/Historical), description, author name, and PDF file upload
acceptanceCriteria: Admin page is accessible at /admin/upload-story route
Form includes text inputs for title, description, and author name
Form includes dropdown for category selection with Islamic and Historical options
Form includes file upload input that accepts PDF files only
Form submits data to backend and shows success/error feedback

requirements.text: Create a Stories Library page at /stories that displays PDF stories organized by category tabs (Islamic and Historical) with story cards showing title, author, description, and a 'Read' button

quotes: no visitor cant download pdf they are only read stories

acceptanceCriteria: Stories page is accessible at /stories route
Page displays category tabs for Islamic and Historical stories
Each story card shows title, author, and description
Story cards have a 'Read' button that opens the PDF viewer
No download button is visible to visitors

requirements.text: Create a PDF reader page at /stories/:id that displays the selected PDF story in a read-only embedded viewer without download capability

quotes: no visitor cant download pdf they are only read stories

acceptanceCriteria: PDF reader page opens when clicking 'Read' on a story card
PDF is displayed in an embedded viewer
Download option is disabled or hidden
Page includes back navigation to the Stories Library

requirements.text: Add 'Stories' link to the main navigation menu that directs to the Stories Library page
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation menu includes 'Stories' link
Link navigates to /stories route
Active state styling applies when on Stories pages

requirements.text: Update the contact form backend to store the email muhammadnouman88555@gmail.com as the recipient email in a configuration or constant
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores muhammadnouman88555@gmail.com as the contact recipient email
Contact form submissions continue to be stored in backend as before

constraints: PDF files must be stored as static assets accessible via URL
PDF viewer must prevent downloading or saving files
Maintain existing child-friendly design theme with warm colors and playful typography
Do not modify existing books catalog functionality
nonGoals: Email notifications for contact form submissions
